title: Todo List Web App
description: This project is a full-stack Django + React application. The backend folder contains a Django REST API (with JWT authentication and PostgreSQL/SQLite support) that manages users and tasks. The frontend folder is a React single-page app that consumes this API to provide a responsive task-management interface.

title: Vehicle Management System
description: A role-based Vehicle Management web application built using Django. The system allows managing vehicle records with controlled access based on user roles. It supports full CRUD operations on vehicles and enforces permissions using Djangoâ€™s authentication system and permission mixins. Security features such as XSS protection and IP filtering via custom middleware are also implemented.

title: Color Game
description: This is a project made to learn 'Event handling' in JavaScript.

title: My Portfolio Website
description: A responsive portfolio website to showcase my skills, projects, and resume with interactive sections and smooth navigation.

title: Algorithmic Trading Order Book Simulator
description: A trading engine that matches buy and sell orders like an exchange, supporting order placement, updates, and partial fills.
